gurmukhi: n roKM n soKM n dRohM n mohM ]n kwmM n kRoDM AjonI AjohM ]7]
transliteration: Na Rokhanndna Sokhanndna Drohan Na Mohan|| Na Kaamannd Na Krodhan Ajonoo Ajohan||7||
translation: He is Ireless, Ever fresh, Deceitless and Non-attached. He is Lustless, Angerless, Birthless and Sightless.7.

gurmukhi: pryAM pivqRM punIqM purwxM ]AjyAM AByAM BivKXw BvwxM ]
transliteration: Dareyan Pavitran Pounootan Puraanan|| Ajean Abhean Bhavikhyan Bhavaanan||
translation: He is in the Yond, Immaculate, Most Holy and Ancient. He is Unconquerable, Indistinguishable, Will be in future and is always Present.

gurmukhi: n rogM n sogM su inqXwM nvInM ]AjwXM shwXM prmM pRbInM ]8]
transliteration: Na Rogadg Na Sogadg Su Nityan Navoonan|| Ajaayan Sahaayan Paramannd||8||
translation: He is without ailment and sorrow and is ever new. He is Birthless, He is the Supporter and is Supremely dexterous.8.

gurmukhi: su BUqM BivKXwM BvwnM BvyAM ]nmo niRibkwrM nmo niRjuryAM ]
transliteration: Su Bhootan Bhavikhyan Bhavaanan Bhavean|| Namo Nribikaaran Namo Nrijurean||
translation: He Pervades in the Past, Future and Present. I Salute Him, Who is without vices and without ailments.

gurmukhi: nmo dyv dyvM nmo rwj rwjM ]inrwlMb inqXwM su rwjwiDrwjM ]9]
transliteration: Namo Dev Devan Namo Raaj Raajan|| Niraalanb Nityan Su Raajaadhiraajan||9||
translation: I Salute Him, Who is the god of gods and king of kings. He is Supportless, Eternal and Greatest of Emperors. 9

gurmukhi: AlyKM AByKM ABUqM AdÍYKM ]n rwgM n rMgM n rUpM n ryKM ]
transliteration: Alekhanndabhekhanndabhootan Advaikhan|| Na Raagadg Na Ranadg Na Roopan Na Rekhan||
translation: He is Accountless, Guiseless, Elementless and Blemishless. He is without attachment, colour, form and mark.

gurmukhi: mhw dyv dyvM mhw jog jogM ]mhw kwm kwmM mhw Bog BogM ]10]
transliteration: Mahaa Dev Devan Mahaa Jog Jouang|| Mahaa Kaam Kaamannd Mahaa Bhog Bhogadg||10||
translation: He is the Greatest of gods and the Supreme Yogi. He is the Greatest of the rapturous and the greatest of the Ravishing.10.

gurmukhi: khUM rwjsM qwmsM swqkyAM ]khUM nwr ky rUp Dwry nryAM ]
transliteration: Kahoon Raajasan Taamasan Saatkean|| Kahoon Naar Ke Roop Dhdare Darean||
translation: Somewhere He bears the quality of rajas (activity), somewhere tamas (morbidity) and somewhere sattva (rhythm). Somewhere He takes the form of a woman and somewhere man.

gurmukhi: khUM dyvIAM dyvqM deIq rUpM ]khUM rUp Anyk Dwry AnUpM ]11]
transliteration: Kahoon Devooan Devatan Daoot Roopan|| Kahoon Roop Anek Dhdare Anoopan||11||
translation: Somewhere He manifests Himself as a goddess, god and demon. Somewhere He appears in several unique forms.11.

gurmukhi: khUM PUl hÍY kY Bly rwj PUly ]khUM Bvr hÍY kY BlI BwNiq BUly ]
transliteration: Kahoon Phool Hvai Kai Bhale Raaj Phoole|| Kahoon Bhavar Hvai Kai Bhaloo Bhaant(i) Bhoole||
translation: Somewhere He, taking the form of a flower, is rightly puffed up. Somewhere becoming a black bee, seems inebriated (for the flower).

gurmukhi: khUM paun hÍY kY bhy byig AYsy ]khy mo n AwvY kQoN qwih kYsy ]12]
transliteration: Kahoon Paoun Hvai Kai Bade Beg(i) Aise|| Kahe Mo Na Aavai Kathon Taah(i) Kaise||12||
translation: Somewhere becoming the wind, moves with such speed, which is indescribable, how can I elucidate it? 12.

gurmukhi: khUM nwd hÍY kY BlI BwNiq bwjy ]rhUM pwrDI hÍY kY Dry bwn rwjy ]
transliteration: Kahoon Naad Hvai Kai Bhaloo Bhaant(i) Baaje|| Kahoon Paaradhoo Hvai Kai Ddare Baan Raaje||
translation: Somewhere He become a musical instrument, which is played appropriately. Somewhere He becomes a hunter who looks glorious with His arrow (in His bow).

gurmukhi: khUM miRg hÍY kY BlI BwNiq mohy ]khUM kwmukI ijau Dry rUp sohy ]13]
transliteration: Kahoon Mrig Hvai Kai Bhaloo Bhaant(i) Mohe|| Kahoon Kaamouki Jio Ddare Roop Sohe||13||
translation: Somewhere He becomes a deer and allures exquisitely. Somewhere He manifests Himself as Cupid’s wife, with impressive beauty.13.

gurmukhi: nhIN jwn jweI kCU rUp ryKM ]khwN bws qw ko iPrY kaun ByKM ]
transliteration: Nahoon Jaan Jaaoo Kachhodh Roop Rekhan|| Kahaan Baas Taa Ko Phirai Kaoun Bhekhan||
translation: His Form and Mark cannot be comprehended. Where doth He live and what guise doth He adopt?
